You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesP P] > &psi;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Psi;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03a8/index.htm U+003A8].
  * `&psi;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03c8/index.htm U+003C8].
